title: Masks Also Helpful for Flu Season, Lustbader Says
itunes:title: Masks Also Helpful for Flu Season, Lustbader Says
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, provides a coronavirus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Features Editor Max Chafkin discuss the story “Palantir Is Bad-Mouthing Big Tech While Taking Its Tech Public.” We get Businessweek Economics with Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva. She talks about fiscal stimulus and Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic's comments. And we Drive to the Close with George Schultze, Founder of Schultze Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
